project.title: Java Blog Platform
project.subtitle: Full Stack Blogging Platform Demo
project.content: For this weekend project, I worked in a pair programming environment to create a blog platform using Java and the Thymeleaf templating engine. We used agile methodologies and Git to ensure we were able to meet all of our deliverables on schedule. 1
